Description:
Before GitHub, TypeScript was hosted on CodePlex, and the community response was "crickets." Anders Hejlsberg explains why simply publishing source code isn't enough. Discover how moving "where the action is" and treating internal engineers like external contributors changed the trajectory of the language forever.

#GitHub #TypeScript #AndersHejlsberg

About GitHub It’s where over 180 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: Why TypeScript moved to GitHub in 2014
Author: GitHub
